title: Top Hezbollah commander killed in Israeli strike on south Beirut
content: Ibrahim Mohammed Kobeissi, a top Hezbollah commander, was killed in an Israeli airstrike on South Beirut. The strike also resulted in six deaths and 15 injuries. Kobeissi was crucial to Hezbollah's missile operations. This incident is part of ongoing hostilities between Hezbollah and Israel since the Gaza war began last October.
summary: Ibrahim Mohammed Kobeissi, a top Hezbollah commander, was killed in an Israeli airstrike on South Beirut. The strike also resulted in six deaths and 15 injuries. Kobeissi was crucial to Hezbollah's missile operations. This incident is part of ongoing hostilities between Hezbollah and Israel since the Gaza war began last October.

title: Golf course gunman charged with attempting an assassination on Donald Trump
content: Ryan Wesley Routh has been charged by the United States for attempting to assassinate Donald Trump at his Florida golf course. Authorities allege he aimed a rifle at Trump while he was playing, and had written about his plans months before.
summary: Ryan Wesley Routh has been charged by the United States for attempting to assassinate Donald Trump at his Florida golf course. Authorities allege he aimed a rifle at Trump while he was playing, and had written about his plans months before.

title: Diddy tunnel: Did Feds find underground bunker at Sean Comb's LA mansion?
content: ​Several social media posts claim there is a tunnel underground Diddy's Los Angeles mansion connecting it to the Playboy mansion, the former home of Playboy magazine founder Hugh Hefner. But a Reuters fact check confirmed that the Diddy tunnel claims are fabricated and one of the many conspiracy theories. There are underwater swimming tunnels reported in the mansion, though.
summary: ​Several social media posts claim there is a tunnel underground Diddy's Los Angeles mansion connecting it to the Playboy mansion, the former home of Playboy magazine founder Hugh Hefner. But a Reuters fact check confirmed that the Diddy tunnel claims are fabricated and one of the many conspiracy theories. There are underwater swimming tunnels reported in the mansion, though.

title: Pope offers refuge to jailed Suu Kyi: Report
How Israel sent warning texts? By hacking Lebanon telecom
Israeli strike kills Hezbollah's top missile commander; toll hits 569
content: Israel announced the killing of Hezbollah commander Ibrahim Kobeisi amid ongoing conflict. Kobeisi was involved in missile attacks on Israel. The death toll in Lebanon has reached nearly 570, causing mass evacuations and traffic jams at the Syria border. Both sides continue heavy exchanges of fire, impacting civilians and military personnel.
summary: Israel announced the killing of Hezbollah commander Ibrahim Kobeisi amid ongoing conflict. Kobeisi was involved in missile attacks on Israel. The death toll in Lebanon has reached nearly 570, causing mass evacuations and traffic jams at the Syria border. Both sides continue heavy exchanges of fire, impacting civilians and military personnel.

title: Barron Trump now has plain-clothed security officers armed with bulletproof vests at NYU. Details here
content: ​The increased security did not perturb Barron as he was seen in his usual element. amid the much hullabaloo around him at the campus. Other students are missing no opportunity to take his photo and those content are viral on various social media platforms. Reports said students are approaching Barron Trump with selfie requests that Barron has to turn down owing to security reasons.

title: Melania Trump was paid $237,500 from Donald Trump's campaign: 'Grifter wife'
content: Melania spoke at two political fundraisers for the Log Cabin Republicans this year and for the April event, she was paid $237,500, CNN reported. But it is not clear who cut the check as Charles Moran, president of the Log Cabin Republicans, earlier told CNN that the group did not put up any money for Melania to speak.
summary: Melania spoke at two political fundraisers for the Log Cabin Republicans this year and for the April event, she was paid $237,500, CNN reported. But it is not clear who cut the check as Charles Moran, president of the Log Cabin Republicans, earlier told CNN that the group did not put up any money for Melania to speak.

title: Delhi roots: New Sri Lankan PM Harini Amarasuriya's fascinating link to India
content: Harini Amarasuriya has been appointed as Sri Lanka's 16th Prime Minister, making her the first woman in this role since Sirimavo Bandaranaike in 2000. An academic-turned-politician, she studied Sociology at Delhi University's Hindu College from 1991 to 1994. Her appointment is expected to bolster ties between India and Sri Lanka.
summary: Harini Amarasuriya has been appointed as Sri Lanka's 16th Prime Minister, making her the first woman in this role since Sirimavo Bandaranaike in 2000. An academic-turned-politician, she studied Sociology at Delhi University's Hindu College from 1991 to 1994. Her appointment is expected to bolster ties between India and Sri Lanka.

title: Donald Trump shares 'nail salon gossip' that Kamala Harris paying $700 for...
content: “Their campaign is getting a bunch of people—that’s why you see these people on the side of the road with signs or whatever going to these protests,” said Gangewere, in the video Trump shared. “They get travel paid for and everything and they’re not even able to vote.” The Daily Beast identified the woman as an OnlyFans model and wondered how Donald Trump got hold of her account.
summary: “Their campaign is getting a bunch of people—that’s why you see these people on the side of the road with signs or whatever going to these protests,” said Gangewere, in the video Trump shared. “They get travel paid for and everything and they’re not even able to vote.” The Daily Beast identified the woman as an OnlyFans model and wondered how Donald Trump got hold of her account.

title: 'Hindus in Bangladesh... : Bangladesh's foreign affairs advisor addresses attacks on minorities
content: Md Touhid Hossain stated that Bangladesh's interim government is ensuring the safety of all citizens, including Hindus. Amid political upheaval and protests against Chief Advisor Muhammad Yunus, Hossain met India's External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar at the UNGA to discuss bilateral relations. Yunus faces allegations of acquiring power unconstitutionally.
summary: Md Touhid Hossain stated that Bangladesh's interim government is ensuring the safety of all citizens, including Hindus. Amid political upheaval and protests against Chief Advisor Muhammad Yunus, Hossain met India's External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar at the UNGA to discuss bilateral relations. Yunus faces allegations of acquiring power unconstitutionally.

title: Prince Harry wins big in visa case; records will not be made public despite drug revelations
content: ​Prince Harry's US visa application will remain private despite his admission of taking drugs in his memoir Spare, a judge has ruled in a big win for the Duke of Sussex. Harry in his memoir admitted that he took cocaine and psychedelic mushrooms triggering the case as to whether he should have been allowed into US in 2020.
summary: ​Prince Harry's US visa application will remain private despite his admission of taking drugs in his memoir Spare, a judge has ruled in a big win for the Duke of Sussex. Harry in his memoir admitted that he took cocaine and psychedelic mushrooms triggering the case as to whether he should have been allowed into US in 2020.

title: Iran president says Hezbollah 'cannot stand alone' against Israel
content: Iran's President Masoud Pezeshkian said Tuesday that its ally Hezbollah "cannot stand alone" against Israel, which carried out its deadliest day of air strikes on Lebanon since 2006. The Israeli military said it had hit about 1,600 Hezbollah targets on Monday, killing a "large number" of militants, and had carried out more strikes on Tuesday.
summary: Iran's President Masoud Pezeshkian said Tuesday that its ally Hezbollah "cannot stand alone" against Israel, which carried out its deadliest day of air strikes on Lebanon since 2006. The Israeli military said it had hit about 1,600 Hezbollah targets on Monday, killing a "large number" of militants, and had carried out more strikes on Tuesday.

title: Trump wants to work at a McDonald's because Kamala did so: 'He's obsessed'
content: Donald Trump said he wants to work at a McDonald's for half an hour to see what it's like as Kamala Harris has been bragging of having the experience of working at a McDonald's when she was a student. Donald Trump has been harping that Kamala Harris never worked at a McDonald's and there has been no record and she lied about it only to come across as a relatable, middle-class person.
summary: Donald Trump said he wants to work at a McDonald's for half an hour to see what it's like as Kamala Harris has been bragging of having the experience of working at a McDonald's when she was a student. Donald Trump has been harping that Kamala Harris never worked at a McDonald's and there has been no record and she lied about it only to come across as a relatable, middle-class person.

title: Sweden accuses Iran of cyberattack tied to Quran burning controversy
content: Swedish authorities have accused Iran of a cyberattack that involved sending thousands of threatening text messages following Quran burnings in 2023. The messages, attributed to the 'Anzu team,' targeted Swedes and complicated Sweden's Nato membership bid. The investigation by Sweden's SAPO domestic security agency is closed but could be reopened.
summary: Swedish authorities have accused Iran of a cyberattack that involved sending thousands of threatening text messages following Quran burnings in 2023. The messages, attributed to the 'Anzu team,' targeted Swedes and complicated Sweden's Nato membership bid. The investigation by Sweden's SAPO domestic security agency is closed but could be reopened.

title: Diddy speaks to children briefly from jail; they are in a state of shock
content: ​​Diddy shares Christian, Jessie and D’Lila with the late model and actress Kim Porter, who died in 2018 at age 47. Quincy was Porter’s son with partner Al B. Sure!, and Diddy adopted him. He shares Justin with stylist Misa Hylton, and Chance with businesswoman Sarah Chapman. His youngest child Love was born in December 2022. Her mother is model Dana Tran.
summary: ​​Diddy shares Christian, Jessie and D’Lila with the late model and actress Kim Porter, who died in 2018 at age 47. Quincy was Porter’s son with partner Al B. Sure!, and Diddy adopted him. He shares Justin with stylist Misa Hylton, and Chance with businesswoman Sarah Chapman. His youngest child Love was born in December 2022. Her mother is model Dana Tran.

title: US News college rankings 2025: List of top universities
content: US News and World Report announced its 2025 rankings for nearly 1,500 U.S. colleges and universities. Categories include best national universities, best national liberal arts colleges, top public schools, top historically black colleges and universities, and top performers on social mobility. US News advises considering these rankings alongside other information when choosing a college.
summary: US News and World Report announced its 2025 rankings for nearly 1,500 U.S. colleges and universities. Categories include best national universities, best national liberal arts colleges, top public schools, top historically black colleges and universities, and top performers on social mobility. US News advises considering these rankings alongside other information when choosing a college.

title: Biden acknowledges he's running out of time as violence escalates in Middle-East: Aides
content: President Joe Biden acknowledges limited time to secure a ceasefire and hostage deal with Hamas amid escalating Middle-East tensions. Aides express frustration over Israeli PM Netanyahu's contradictory actions. The US is sending additional troops to the region due to rising violence between Israel and Hezbollah, while Biden prepares for his last major speech at the UN General Assembly.
summary: President Joe Biden acknowledges limited time to secure a ceasefire and hostage deal with Hamas amid escalating Middle-East tensions. Aides express frustration over Israeli PM Netanyahu's contradictory actions. The US is sending additional troops to the region due to rising violence between Israel and Hezbollah, while Biden prepares for his last major speech at the UN General Assembly.

title: Singapore commissions two new submarines as Asia's undersea rivalry grows
content: Singapore has commissioned two new advanced submarines named Invincible and Impeccable. Ordered from Germany in 2013, these vessels enhance the country's naval capabilities with advanced technology that allows operation farther from shore using fewer sailors. They also feature air-independent propulsion systems and facilities for female crew members.
summary: Singapore has commissioned two new advanced submarines named Invincible and Impeccable. Ordered from Germany in 2013, these vessels enhance the country's naval capabilities with advanced technology that allows operation farther from shore using fewer sailors. They also feature air-independent propulsion systems and facilities for female crew members.

title: American hiker found dead on South Africa's Table Mountain
content: Brook Cheuvront, a 20-year-old student from North Carolina, went missing while hiking on South Africa’s Table Mountain and was later found dead. She had been in Cape Town for an internship. Her body was discovered on Devil’s Peak, and an investigation is ongoing to determine the cause of her death.
summary: Brook Cheuvront, a 20-year-old student from North Carolina, went missing while hiking on South Africa’s Table Mountain and was later found dead. She had been in Cape Town for an internship. Her body was discovered on Devil’s Peak, and an investigation is ongoing to determine the cause of her death.
